TextLibrary.Text: You have done well once again.
You have done well once again.
You have done well once again.
You have done well once again.
You were right, Khrona, those Ogres are trouble. I think that all I've done is slow them down.
You were right, Khrona, those Ogres are trouble. I think that all I've done is slow them down.

I sense Gruulkar's hand in all this. He knows more than he is telling us.

We'll deal with Gruulkar when the time is right.
